body: r_c watches the vigil being held for m_c from the sidelines, not at all sure how {PRONOUN/r_c/subject} {VERB/r_c/feel/feels} about {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} death.

r_c resented m_c for what {PRONOUN/r_c/subject} couldn't have, but seeing m_c's body lying in the clearing as the Clan hold vigil for {PRONOUN/m_c/object} makes {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} jealousy feel petty and stupid.
r_c has always felt jealous of m_c, but could never want to take {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} place now, watching the Clan holding vigil for {PRONOUN/m_c/object}.

r_c listens to the stories being passed around as the vigil for m_c continues, and stalks off to {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} nest. {PRONOUN/r_c/subject/CAP} can't stand hearing everyone praise such a useless cat.
m_c really wasn't that great, but it's amazing how many cats want to ignore that now that {PRONOUN/m_c/subject}{VERB/m_c/'re/'s} dead, and r_c isn't interested in hearing it.

Jealousy is a term better suited for kits; whether it's being disappointingly weak at mossball while others excel, someone receiving your favorite prey as a gift, or being hailed as the greatest cat ever when no one truly cares about them. But none of these things applied to r_c. It wasn't about m_c being a little too skilled at certain things. After all, perfection is a myth, so why shouldn't {PRONOUN/r_c/subject} highlight m_c's flaws and mistakes at {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} vigil?

m_c really wasn't that great, but it's amazing how many cats want to ignore that now that {PRONOUN/m_c/subject}{VERB/m_c/'re/'s} dead, and r_c isn't interested in hearing it.

It seemed childish for r_c to stick out {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} tongue mockingly when the announcement of m_c's death reached {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} ears. But on the other paw, r_c doesn't care at all. For moons, m_c had been showered with praise and love by all, while r_c received barely any, despite both pledging loyalty to their Clan. {PRONOUN/r_c/subject/CAP} guesses for m_c, it just mattered more. Hopefully, with m_c's body not found and no vigil to be held, genuine attention and love can now be directed towards others.
